Package com.alvermont.terraj.planet

Contains a Java port of the planetary terrain generator originally written by Torben AE Mogensen.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AllPlanetParameters Bean class that wraps up all parameters used by objects in this package to generate terrains.
PlanetGen Ported to java from the original C code by Torben AE.
PlanetGenExample Simple example of how the planetary terrain generator can be used
PlanetParameters Bean class holding properties of the planet
ProjectionParameters A bean class that holds the parameters for use by the projection
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.planet Description

Contains a Java port of the planetary terrain generator originally written by Torben AE Mogensen.

Related Documentation

For the original C version of this program please see:
  • http://www.diku.dk/users/torbenm/
